name: Lone King
description:
Simultaneous-turn-based tactics with a single unit versus a small army. Extremely simple controls inspired by chess. Play the base game (arcade mode) for free and comment in the forums on Steam to voice your opinion on problems and suggestions.

Choose your Maniple and give it a single order: where to move. Attacks and abilities are automated, and each Maniple moves and attacks differently. All you need to do is right click.

Levels are randomly generated and populated with random combinations and positions of enemies. The game is set up to allow for quick matches.

If you enjoy the game, consider buying the story mode! (coming soon?)
